title: To Kill a Mockingbird (To Kill a Mockingbird)
description: The unforgettable novel of a childhood in a sleepy Southern town and the crisis of conscience that rocked it. "To Kill A Mockingbird" became both an instant bestseller and a critical success when it was first published in 1960. It went on to win the Pulitzer Prize in 1961 and was later made into an Academy Award-winning film
isbn13: "To Kill A Mockingbird" takes readers to the roots of human behavior - to innocence and experience

author_url: this regional story by a young Alabama woman claims universal appeal. Harper Lee always considered her book to be a simple love story. Today it is regarded as a masterpiece of American literature.
